name: Bounce rate
description: Bounce rate reflects a single page session. These sessions happen when a customer visits certain page and closes it without clicking on any link or doing any action. A too low or too high bounce rate on your website or a specific web page might indicate a measurement issue.

blocks.description: It checks if the bounce rate on any page is not between 10% and 95%, if not, this test fails.
blocks.passMessage: Bounce Rate is within expected bounds ${lowerThreshold*100} and ${upperThreshold*100} %
blocks.failMessage: Bounce Rate (${totalbounceRate}) is not between ${lowerThreshold*100} and ${upperThreshold*100} %
blocks.failHowtofix:
Following points should be checked:
1. Pageview is not duplicated
2. Pageview is triggered after on all pages
3. Event has correctly setup non-interaction.
